prompt: Subject: Two silhouettes (The Woman and The Man) embracing closely. Context: Cozy, lived-in apartment during golden hour, viewed through an exterior window. Action: Holding each other in a tight, tender embrace. Style: Soft, warm, cinematic aesthetic with natural golden hour lighting. Composition: Medium shot transitioning to wide shot as camera retreats, framing the window and interior silhouettes. Ambiance: Golden hour light casting a warm glow, earthy color palette, intimate and reflective mood.
